name: Litentry

name: Clover
description: Clover is a substrate based smart contract platform built for Polkadot, with added support for Ethereum developers to participate in the Polkadot ecosystem

name: Parallel

name: Crust
description: Crust implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage

name: Manta
description: Manta Network is focused on applying cutting-edge cryptographic constructions such as zkSNARKs to deliver end-to-end privacy guarantees for blockchain apps

name: SubDAO

name: Darwinia
description: Darwinia is a trustless multi-chain bridge hub network designed to become the foundational layer for the next generation of Web3.0 dapps and games

name: SubGame
description: SubGame builds multiple applications through a complete technical architecture

name: Efinity
description: Built with Polkadot, Efinity will serve as the infrastructure for the decentralized, cross-chain Metaverse

name: Ares Protocol
description: Ares protocol is the decentralized cross-chain oracle service protocol in the Polkadot ecosystem

name: Nodle
description: Nodle is a decentralized wireless network, harnessing the power of smartphones to provide a low-cost and secure IoT infrastructure for enterprises, device manufacturers, and smart cities

name: Coinversation
description: Coinversation Protocol is a synthetic asset issuance protocol and decentralised contract trading exchange based on the Polkadot contract chain

name: Interlay

name: Centrifuge
description: Centrifuge Chain is the gateway for real-world assets to the Blockchain Multiverse

name: Composable Finance
description: Composable’s parachain is going to be able to run multiple bytecodes together in the same place, in order to run smart contracts together in a manner that allows them to communicate and collaborate

name: Equilibrium
description: The functionality of all key DeFi apps on one platform, with advanced bailout mechanism for system security

name: Phala
description: Trustless computation platform that enables massive cloud processing without sacrificing data confidentiality

name: HydraDX

name: Polkadex

name: Geminis
description: Geminis takes Ethereum chain support to the next level through WasmEdge.

name: Unique Network
description: Unique Network is a scalable blockchain for composable NFTs with advanced economies

name: Bifrost Polkadot
description: Bifrost is a DeFi protocol that connect with Polkadot and different PoS blockchains to provide staking derivative though XCMP or Smart Contract
